response.overview: Terry is a small-time car dealer trying to leave his shady past behind and start a family. Martine is a beautiful model from Terry's old neighbourhood who knows that Terry is no angel. When Martine proposes a foolproof plan to rob a bank, Terry recognises the danger but realises this may be the opportunity of a lifetime.
response.tagline: The true story of a heist gone wrong... in all the right ways.
response.title: The Bank Job

results.name: The Bank Job - official UK trailer. Lionsgate Films
